CutSceneText.Text: Ah, you are here, [%username]. Unfortunately, I have summoned you once again to entrust you with another important mission.
As you know, the Tursin Krall have quieted down, and most of Jurid's men have been eliminated.
And we sent men to various regions to locate Jurid's whereabouts, but...
Scouts sent to the [Vein of Flame] went missing, so we sent the Red Flame Squad who were in the [Barat Subterranean Heat Area].
We lost contact with them as well, so this time we dispatched the Blood Sky Knights... And yet again, we haven't heard anything from them for several days now.
That dungeon is as confusing as a labyrinth and dangerous, but it isn't a place where we'd expect the entire Blood Sky Knights to be annihilated.
Then... That's the place where...?
Yes, we also believe that's the place where the traitor [Jurid] is hiding now.
I want you to go there with a number of capable allies and look for any evidence.
When the work here is completed, I'm going to leave this place to Belus and go personally to the [Vein of Flame].
The entrance to the dungeon is found at the [Mouth of Pregion] in the [Barat Subterranean Heat Area].
That place is extremely dangerous, so you better be thoroughly prepared.
On behalf of all the people of Tijerid, I express my gratitude to you and your friends.
So all these disasters were caused by an [Asmodian]...
... I thought that the Asmodians have completely disappeared from Elcion...
It seems Kallaine aside, many other Asmodians have come up to Elysea.
... But, announcing this to the public will put Elysea into confusion, so let us continue to observe this situation for a while longer.
The [Tower of Light] is formally denying this allegation...
But I detect suspicious signs from inside the [Tower of Light] as well...
So the Fourth Holy Knight Squadron is investigating it independently. For this case as well, following the trace of the Asmodians has led us to this place...
Several indications were also observed in Fesra, Erole and Juhdenil as well, so the investigations are under way.
It is all thanks to my companion [Aize], who can detect these indications.
I guess we also better be fully prepared. Who knows, we might just have the Third Elysean-Asmodian War on our hands.
...I don't even want to think about that... But I can't deny that possibility.
The world is going to be plunged into chaos once again...
As this case came to an end, I will return to the [Tower of Light].
[%username], I think I might be needing your help again some day.
I hope you will lend us a hand once again when the day arrives. Good bye...
